solution_line_template: In one week, the 3 men can eat {jake_papayas_per_week} + {brother_papayas_per_week} + {father_papayas_per_week} = <<{jake_papayas_per_week}+{brother_papayas_per_week}+{father_papayas_per_week}={total_papayas_per_week}>>{total_papayas_per_week} papayas.
For {num_weeks} weeks, Jake will need to buy {total_papayas_per_week} x {num_weeks} = <<{total_papayas_per_week}*{num_weeks}={total_papayas_needed}>>{total_papayas_needed} papayas.
